page.title: 13Dean of Llandaff Cathedral.
page.content: The Dean is also vicar of Llandaff parish. He normally gets up at 7:00 a.m. and leaves the Deanery at 7:25 to go to the Eucharist and Matins. Afterwards he returns home for breakfast. Then the Dean returns to the Cathedral to meet groups of visiters. Then he carries out any pressing paper work at the Deanery with his part-time secretary. After lunch the Dean visits sick people at home or in hospital and he gives Communion to some. Before Evensong at 6:00 p.m. he prepares imminent speaches or sermons. Ater that he attends meetings until about 9:30 p.m. before going to bed. His only relaxation is in sleeping. The Dean likes people and the variety his work brings, and he dislikes refusing people and finds comforting people sometimes difficult.
